did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: 8.2 cubic ft.; 2 audiocassettes; 2 reels negative microfilm.
Lecture notes, drafts, typescripts, biographical material, financial papers, correspondence, letters of recommendation, microfilm, audiocassettes, and department files.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
Lecture notes, drafts and typescripts for articles and books, including
Goethe and the Novel; also lecture notes and texts for his course "Great Moments in German Literature"; notes from Cambridge University; biographical material, financial papers, correspondence, letters of recommendation, and audiocassettes of Blackall's memorial service of 27 January 1990; and German Literature
Department files.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Scholar and critic of German and Austrian literature. Cornell University Professor of German literature.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p:
Lecture notes, drafts and typescripts for articles and books, including
Goethe and the Novel; also lecture notes and texts for his course "Great Moments in German Literature"; notes from Cambridge University; biographical material, financial papers, correspondence, letters of recommendation, and audiocassettes of Blackall's memorial service of 27 January 1990; and German Literature
Department files.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.persname: Blackall, Eric A. (Eric Albert). Goethe and the novel.
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Dept. of German Literature.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Eric A. Blackall Papers, #14-18-2761. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p:
Note by Jean F. Blackall on
Goethe und der Roman: "This is the original ms. and it is longer than the one subsequently published by the Cornell University Press in English. The English Version was written from this ms."

Series IV. Correspondence, records of the Department of German Literature at Cornell; biographical material; lectures

scopecontent.p: Note by Jean F. Blackall: "In the file marked 'Various Lectures' and in folders throughout these boxes there are typescripts of many public lectures given by Eric Blackall. Though many of his lectures were published, I believe that there are others here which have not."

Series V. Cambridge University class notes; other miscellaneous papers

scopecontent.p: Note by Jean F. Blackall: "Eric gave a very popular course called `Great Moments in German Literature' - sometimes known as `Eric's Great Moments.' The lectures are among his papers but I do not know whether the selections to which they refer are identified other than by these mimeographs."
